p: The validity of model 4 is further supported by analyzing data of several more crystals. In all cases, the refined occupancies were not significantly different. The composition SiB 2.64(2) suggests the presence of 88% B 10Si p 2 and 12% B 11Si p icosahedra in the disordered α-SiB 3– x structure (the occurrence of B 12 or B 9Si p 3 icosahedra is rather unlikely; see next section). As a reminder, 100% Si 2B 10 and 100% SiB 11 icosahedra would correspond to the compositions SiB 2.5 and SiB 3.67, respectively.
